meanings.definition: Not able to be specified or defined.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious creature had an unspecifiable appearance.
meanings.sent2: The artist's abstract painting was truly unspecifiable.
meanings.sent3: Trying to guess what was inside the unspecifiable box was a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like an unspecifiable whirlwind, constantly changing.
meanings.sent5: The unspecifiable smell in the room made everyone curious.

meanings.sent1: The strange figure in the distance was unspecifiable.
meanings.sent2: The ghostly presence felt unspecifiable and eerie.
meanings.sent3: The unspecifiable noise coming from the attic was both spooky and intriguing.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were an unspecifiable maze, impossible to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The unspecifiable taste of the exotic fruit left them speechless.
